item.title: Review of 'Ansible and Terraform: Better Together'
item.description: Original article Ansible and Terraform: Better Together Why do you need more than Ansible? Ansible doesn’t necessarily have to own and do every single task that it sets out to do; Like an instrument in an orchestra, others may be better positioned for particular tasks. Ansible Vault vs Terraform Vault I would assume, since Terraform is a Hashicorp product, then the recommended secret solution would their Vault. 1 ewwlinks +/"The Vault provider allows Terraform to read from, write to, and configure Hashicorp Vault.
